Joselyn Dumas ( /ˌ dʒ ɔː s əl ɪ n D ʊ m ɑː / ; amuru 31 August 1980)  bu onye nnabata ihe onyonyo Ghana na onye omere
N'afọ 2014 ọ gbara n'ime ihe nkiri A Northern Affair, ọrụ nwetara ya ihe nrite ihe nkiri Ghana na nhọpụta ihe nkiri Africa Movie Academy Award maka onye na- eme ihe nkiri kacha mma
A mụrụ Dumas na Ghana ma tó n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Accra, Ghana
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ izizi ya na Morning Star School  wee gaa na Archbishop Porter Girls High School  ebe ọ ghọrọ Prefect Entertainment
Joselyn gara n'ihu n'akwụkwọ ya na United States ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ iji nweta nzere na Iwu nchịkwa
Joselyn Dumas bụ onye ọka iwu  ruo mgbe ọ kwagara Ghana na-eso nrọ nke I bu onye na-egosi na onyonyo
O mere mpụta mbụ na onyonyo dị ka onye ọbịa nke Charter House's Rhythmz, Ihe ngosi ntụrụndụ, nke hụrụ ajụjụ ọnụ ọtụtụ ndị a ma ama
Onye isi ụlọ ọrụ TV na-achụpụ ya bụ ViaSat 1 ka ọ nọrọ na nso nso a nke mbụ ha mepụtara flagship Talk show, The One Show,  nke ewepụtara site na 2010 ruo 2014
Ọ bụ onye nnabata maka ihe ngosi akụkọ TV N'ụlọ ya na Joselyn Dumas nke ekesara n'ofe Africa na akụkụ Europe
Ọrụ ya na Foto zuru oke, mere mmetụta na-adịgide adịgide na onye nduzi nke mere ka ọ bụrụ isi ọrụ ndị na-esote na fim ndị ọzọ
Nnukwu ezumike ya bịara afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị na Shirley Frimpong-Manso usoro ihe nkiri Adams Apples
Ọrụ nke "Jennifer Adams" na Adams Apples nwetara aha ya maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na onye ndu na Hollywood Actress Kimberly Elise na 2011 Ghana Movie Awards
Kemgbe Joselyn Dumas bịara na ihe nkiri na Ghana
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na fim na usoro dị ka ịhụnanya ma ọ bụ ihe yiri nke ahụ, A Sting in a Tale, Foto zuru oke, Affair Northern na Lekki nwunye
Ya na ụfọdụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri n'Africa, gụnyere John Dumelo, Majid Michel nke Ghana na OC Ukeje nke Naijiria.
O mebere Miss Malaika Ghana,   otu n'ime asọmpi ịma mma kachasị ama na Ghana, site na 2008 ruo 2010
Ọ bụkwa onye nchoputa na CEO nke Virgo Sun Company Limited, ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta nke n'okpuru nduzi ya, ejikọtalarị ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ Love or Something Like that, nke UNAIDS kwadoro
Ọ na-atụ anya imepụta yana itinye ego na mmemme onyonyo ma ọ bụ usoro dị ka V Republic, usoro onyonyo  nke Sparrow Productions na mepụta ukwu  site na VirgoSun.
Dumas pụtara dị ka nwunye na egwu Lynxx "Fine Lady" gosiputa Wizkid
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya nke Range Rover Evoque Ghana    na Jobberman Ghana, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi ọrụ
Ya na Ayo Makun na-akwado ya na 2018 Golden Movie Awards Africa emere na Movenpick Ambassador Hotel na Accra na June 2, 2018, Ghana
O kwenyere n'inyeghachi ọha mmadụ, ọkachasị ebe ụmụaka nwere nsogbu
Mmasị ya maka ọrụ enyemaka butere nguzobe nke Joselyn Canfor-Dumas Foundation (JCDF) iji nyere aka gboo mkpa ụmụaka na-adịghị ike sitere na nzụlite na mpaghara Ghana niile
Ntọala JCD na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na-elekwasị anya na Autism
